text: int main ( ) { long long int cost [ 10 ] , n [ 10 ] , a [ 25 ] [ 25 ] ; int T , temp ; int i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < T ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & n [ j ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n [ j ] ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ j ] [ i ] ) ; } } if ( T >= 1 && T <= 10 ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < T ; j ++ ) { cost [ j ] = 0 ; if ( n [ j ] >= 2 && n [ j ] <= 50000 ) { for ( i = 0 ; i < n [ j ] - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ j ] [ i ] < a [ j ] [ i + 1 ] ) { cost [ j ] += a [ j ] [ i ] ; temp = a [ j ] [ i ] ; a [ j ] [ i ] = a [ j ] [ i + 1 ] ; a [ j ] [ i + 1 ] = temp ; } else if ( a [ j ] [ i ] > a [ j ] [ i + 1 ] ) { cost [ j ] += a [ j ] [ i + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%lld\n" , cost [ j ] ) ; } } } return 0 ; }
